General.Name: Mega Sun City Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Rekatech Capital Berhad, an investment holding company, provides project management and property investment services in Malaysia. The company's Project Management Services segment offers project design evaluation, project value engineering, and project construction management services for commercial and residential property development industries. This segment also engages in the trading of building and construction materials; supply of computer, server, hardware, and accessories; and consultation of computer software. Its Property Investment Holding segment engages in the letting of properties and provision of support services. Rekatech Capital Berhad also provides home stay services. The company was formerly known as Mega Sun City Holdings Berhad and changed its name to Rekatech Capital Berhad in December 2022. Rekatech Capital Berhad was founded in 1994 and is based in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
